name: WebApplication
body:
# Welcome all!

We glad to present our final Web-Application project.

### About the project:
In this project we created a Blog website, which include all the core features of a general blog.
There are posts, comments, and users in the blog.
Post can include videos and images built-in.
Each user can subscribe to the website and start viewing posts, and use the Search bar as necessary. 
There is a users and role management engine- each role will decide what should exposed to user.

## Teachnical information:
###Server side technology:
* ASP.NET (Freamework 4.5.2) based on Microsoft MVC 5 architecture.
* The data handled by Entity Framework, and stored on SQL Server.
* CRUD functionality: Create, Read, Update, Delete of entities. 

###Client side technology:
* HTML5: Video, Canvas, and the following page design: Aside, footer, header, nav bar, section.
* CSS3: Text-shadow, Transition, Multiple-columns, Font-face, Border-radius.
* More: JQuery,JavaScript, Ajax.
